title: 2 Storey House in Thalawathugoda
details:
Rectangular shape land of 15 perches
4 Bedrooms 3 Bathroom (2 attached)
3000 sq ft. Parking for 2 vehicles
Full kitchen, Dining, Living room, Small Balcony
Has access to the gymnasium
Swimming pool, Squash court, Tennis court
24/7 security, Great location 
Rent – 150,000/= (Negotiable)
Selling – 50 million (Negotiable)
